TTS_Total_Tickets: Total support tickets and issues

Package_Distribution.name: Service Package Adoption

Revenue_Concentration.name: Dependency on Top Payment Types
Revenue_Concentration.business_value: Identify over-reliance on single payment model

GSM_Cross_Sell.name: GSM Services Cross-sell Opportunity
indicators: High Total_RPU subscribers: Best targets for GSM upgrade

calculation_rules: Always use latest record per subscriber
Filter WHERE Subscriber_Status IS NOT NULL
Revenue trends: compare same period YoY or MoM
Service quality: focus on active subscribers (exclude Deactivated)
reporting_rules: Always include sample size and percentage change
Flag subscribers with > 10 outages as 'High Risk'

definitions.churn_rate: % of subscribers that deactivate per period
definitions.retention_rate: % of active subscribers from previous period still active
definitions.growth_rate: YoY or MoM percentage change in subscriber count
definitions.ltv: Lifetime Value = ARPU * Average Customer Tenure (in years)
